Package Interface

Class MainBoardSceneController

java.lang.Object
Interface.SceneController
Interface.MainBoardSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainBoardSceneController extends SceneController
This class is responsible for the logic of the main board scene

    • updateManuscript

      public void updateManuscript(String name, CardFace cardFace, int x, int y)
      Updates the manuscript of the player This method is called to place a new card
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player, useful to find the correct manuscript to place
      cardFace - the cardface
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
